material.title: Features FL Studio 12
material.content: FL Studio is an excellent sequencer for those who want to create bits. A handy Explorer window and editing windows like a playlist, piano keyboard or a pattern window will help you to work the way you want. Thanks to the mixer with precise settings and a large library of plug-ins, FL Studio is an excellent application for editing audio.

material.title: Dynamo - Shakhtar
material.content: Dynamo and Shakhtar have failed to reveal the winner
